title: isssues in patch 6.16 :(
body: **when i start the game and choose my champion it goes fine and when i go to download my character show me a message said that my game has crashed !! i don't know why** ?? {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Issues like this can happen when the game fails to render properly.  This can be due to bad game files, outdated drivers, or something else entirely.  I suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide, which will offer a series of steps to help resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
